docs.title: About me

docs.text:
Introduction


Pick random item from box.


Dependence


None


Source code


Link


Usage


Create instance


var
 
gashapon
 
=
 
new
 
Gashapon
({

    
mode
:
 
shuffle
,
  
// 0|
shuffle
|1|
random

    
items
:
 
{

        
a
:
1
,
 
b
:
2
,
 
c
:
3
  
// itemName:count

    
},

    
reload
:
 
true
,
     
// true|false


});





Properties




mode : 


'shuffle'
, or 
0
 : pick item from box without put it back.


'random'
, or 
1
 : pick item from box then put it back.






reload : set 
true
 to reload items when box is empty for 
shuffle
 mode.


items : initial items in box




Pick item


Pick a random item


var
 
item
 
=
 
gashapon
.
next
();
  
// return null if pick nothing





Try pick specific item


var
 
item
 
=
 
gashapon
.
next
(
a
);
  
// return null if pick nothing





Last picked item


var
 
item
 
=
 
gashapon
.
result
;





Set item


Set item


gashapon
.
setItem
(
a
,
 
1
);


// gashapon.setItem(
a
, 1).setItem(
b
, 2).setItem(
c
, 3);





Remove item


Remove item


gashapon
.
removeItem
(
a
);


// gashapon.removeItem(
b
).gashapon.removeItem(
c
);





Remove all items


gashapon
.
removeAllItems
();





Get current status in JSON object


var
 
status
 
=
 
gashapon
.
toJSON
();


// var gashapon2 = new Gashapon(status); // create new Gashapon object using previous status





Get items


For each item


gashapon
.
eachItem
(
function
(
name
,
 
count
){

    
console
.
log
(
name
 
+
 
: 
 
+
 
count
);


});





Get items


var
 
items
 
=
 
gashapon
.
getItems
();
docs.title: Gashapon
Create instance

docs.text: var   item   =   gashapon . next ();    // return null if pick nothing
docs.title: Pick a random item

docs.text: var   item   =   gashapon . next ( a );    // return null if pick nothing
docs.title: Try pick specific item

docs.text: gashapon . setItem ( a ,   1 );  // gashapon.setItem( a , 1).setItem( b , 2).setItem( c , 3);
docs.title: Set item

docs.text: gashapon . removeItem ( a );  // gashapon.removeItem( b ).gashapon.removeItem( c );
docs.title: Remove item

docs.text: var   status   =   gashapon . toJSON ();  // var gashapon2 = new Gashapon(status); // create new Gashapon object using previous status
docs.title: Get current status in JSON object

docs.text:
gashapon . eachItem ( function ( name ,   count ){ 
     console . log ( name   +   :    +   count );  });
docs.title: For each item
